__e: He'll end up heading his father's factories or his mother's bank.
Everywhere you look, every friend, every relative, everybody you know either, you know, works for one of the big three or at one of the parts plants.
The happiest day of my life was here, the day I left you two crap factories.
You know... that he never bought anything else except factories and shares?
And once we do that... we can truly be proud of our factories and of our progress.
And that is why some of us end up with our names above the factories and others just on the clocking-in cards.
